description.value:
Prerequisite(s): One Brutal Crocodile Maneuver
Range: Melee
Target: Attacking Creature
Duration: Initiated grapple

Description

Discipline: Brutal Crocodile (Counter) You snag your opponent in the midst of their attack, refusing to let go. When a creature makes a melee attack roll against you, you may initiate this counter to make a grapple check against the target. On a success, the creature's attack is negated, and you begin grappling the target. While grappling the creature, you deal [[2d6]] points of damage each round that you maintain the grapple (this stacks with any damage you may deal with constrict).
